The  RP hasn't heard the noise since.  Their descriptions sound  like a fox or fishercat. Officers checked the area where the  noise came from, and nothing was found. The area is also in  the middle of two of the neighbor's back yards.  Spoke with a neighbor ((MBBBRMB‚Ñ¢) how stated that they heard  the same noise a while ago, in the same general area.  Officers believe it to be wildlife.  ~  For Date:  03/27/2019  Wednesday
